response.overview: What would happen if science had proof that Jesus existed before the Jurassic time period? Enter the lab with a scientist who discovers evidence to prove that Jurassic Jesus did exist! This video contains such a strong soul winning message with a dramatic visual impact, that will compel the lost to come to Christ. Jurassic Jesus is strong doctrinal content in a contemporary setting, that will be a dynamic training tool for the young and mature believer as well. This video is 35 minutes in length.
response.tagline: What If a Scientist Discovered That Jesus Christ prey existed the Jurassic Period?
response.title: Jurassic Jesus
